reply.author: BROSTUDIO Dev
reply.content: Hi. Could you please tell me what SmartWatch you use? Analog and Digital Watchfaces uses the same algoritm - so everything should be ok. On my LG Urbane and ZenWatch 2 the time is correct. Please try to synchronize device with your smartfone one more time and msg me if this helps. I will check the issue as soon as I get info from you. Best regards
